name: Dog Grooming Clippers, Low Noise, Electric Quiet, Adjustable Clipper Comb, Rechargeable Cordless Dog Hair Clippers for Dogs Cats Pets, Gold
short_description: Cordless Design: The cordless design allows you to be unrestrained during the trimming process, you could groom your pets anywhere. No need to worry about the entanglement of wires, improving the convenience of operation, it is an ideal choice for home and professional pet grooming.

Adjustable length to meet different needs: The pet clippers is equipped with multiple adjustment length options (including 3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm), freely control the length of pet hair according to your needs. Easily create an ideal trimming effect, suitable for the grooming needs of different pets.

Blades are sharp and safe: HEAPETS dog grooming clippers equipped with high-quality ceramic blades, sharp and durable, it can quickly trim even thick hair, no stuck hair no hurt skin, giving your pet a good haircut experience.

Low Noice, Poweful Motor: Dog hair clippers is only about 50dB in operation, allowing even the most timid and sensitive pets to enjoy their grooming experience without fear. High rotating speed motor provides strong and lasting power to the running blades, which means trim thick hair without blocking, snag or pull.

Long battery life and USB Rechargeble: A full three-hour charge provides approximately 180 minutes of continuous use, offering unparalleled convenience. USB charging design, this dog hair trimmers can charge with wall charger, power bank, desktop or laptop etc. Never worry the battery's used up, it's very easy to carry in anywhere.
Easy Maintenance: The blade is detachable and waterproof, washable directly under the water tab, you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Important Tips For Pet Hair Trimming: For pets with long and thick hair, you need to cut it shorter first with scissors, otherwise the dog clippers for grooming may get stuck and not work properly.

name: 200W Professional Dog Grooming Clippers with Stepless Speed Control, Low Noise <50dB Pet Hair Trimmer Kit, Solid Wood Handle, 2 Blades, Dual-Sided Guide Combs, Heavy-Duty Plug-in Clippers for Cats
short_description: 【200W Heavy-Duty Motor with Stepless Speed Control】This professional dog grooming clipper features a robust 200W copper motor with stepless speed adjustment (2000–6000 RPM). Whether you’re grooming small pets at home or handling large dogs with thick coats in a salon, the variable speed gives you the precision and power needed for any coat type. Ideal for home use and professional groomers.

【Titanium & Ceramic Blades – Sharp, Safe, Long-Lasting】Equipped with a titanium fixed blade and a ceramic moving blade, these clippers provide sharp, safe, and heat-resistant performance. The detachable design makes cleaning and replacement easy. Includes 2 dual-sided guide combs (3mm/6mm & 9mm/12mm), offering versatile trimming lengths for different breeds and grooming styles.

【Ultra-Quiet & Low Vibration (<50dB)】With advanced noise reduction and vibration-absorbing construction, this dog clipper runs under 50 dB, making it perfect for anxious dogs, nervous cats, or sensitive pets. Low vibration ensures a calm grooming session, while the adjustable speed allows you to start slow and gradually increase for stress-free trimming.

【Premium Solid Wood Handle & Durable Build】Designed with an ergonomic solid wood handle and durable matte metal housing, this pet grooming clipper reduces vibration and heat buildup for long sessions. Unlike plastic alternatives, the solid wood handle provides a premium grip that won’t crack or deform, ensuring long-lasting comfort and control for both home users and professional groomers.

【Lubricating Oil Included – Hidden at the Bottom】A bottle of lubricating oil is included inside the white plastic box at the bottom of the package. Apply a few drops before and after each grooming session to maintain blade sharpness and ensure smooth performance. (Compatible with standard sewing machine oil for future use.)
